nodes.documentation:
a = address(this).balance
b = totalFunded
c = buyers[buyer].totalFunded
d = buyers[buyer].totalBought
e = wtokensToRefund
( ( c * (a / b) ) / d ) * e = (refund amount)
nodes.name: getRefundAmount
